name: Sandy Beach - Gloss Black Frame - Neutral Grey Polarized Lens

features: Lens: Neutral Grey - Offers the highest available light reduction for the richest colours and sharpest contrast.
Lens Material: MauiPure - Our most popular lens material. It combines optics almost as crisp as SuperThin Glass with ultra lightweight and excellent scratch and shatter resistance.
Shape: Soft, rectangular frame complements a range of facial shapes
Bridge: Fixed, saddle-style with non-slip, Rubberon nose pads for comfort
Finishing Treatment: Gloss finish for a sleek look, paddle temple structure for a snug, comfortable fit during sports
Material: Grilamid TR 90LX, a light, durable, polymer with extreme bending strength known for retaining its shape, extra-grip Rubberon temple ends ensure a secure fit
Hinge: Anti-corrosive, stainless steel pin hinge with nylon resin coating offers lightweight strength
